attributes.action: begin population control in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The world population is too high and still growing.  We need to at least consider this and if necessary address it.

Over-population causes pollution, congestion, poverty and a destruction of the "natural" world.  Current levels and growth are unsustainable and taxes and rationing are merely window dressing.

We need to phase out financial incentives to have more than one child per couple and significantly reduce immigration.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "begin population control in the UK."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11522.asp

Prime Minister's Office
